m_descr: This module gets events from DoorLockModule and turns configured devices in specified states.
l_standby_mechanism_help_on: Below devices can be chosen, and set to the defined state when standby mode is on (Binary switch: on|off, Multilevel switch: 0|99).
l_room_help: You can find the room id in the Settings Rooms Edit the specific room last character in the URL
l_standby_mechanism_help_off: Below devices can be chosen, and set to the defined state when standby mode is off (Binary switch: on|off, Multilevel switch: 0|99).
